award_title: Beginnings: Biotechnology Industry Opportunities, Professional Readiness, and Employment Program
subject: Reducing the friction of sharing lab methods
body:
Hi Lindsey,

With BIO-PREP focused on building technical skillsets and industry readiness for biotech careers, I imagine you're fielding a fair amount of requests—students asking for scripts, employers wanting to see curriculum materials, other programs looking to replicate what you've built.

Ouro provides a thin API layer over computational workflows, letting other researchers reuse methods directly instead of recreating them from papers. It's a way to consolidate the work you're already doing—sharing code, answering emails, digging up old materials—into a single durable endpoint.

With winter break coming up, I'll keep this brief. Happy to give you a quick peek if it's useful.

Happy holidays,

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
